title: Henry Kye, PhD
text:
As a passionate entrepreneur, I’m embarking on a mission to empower Small to Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) to harness the power of Digital Transformation. I believe that every business deserves access to cutting-edge resources, and I’m committed to helping SMEs overcome the common barriers that hinder their growth.
In addition, I’m a Quantitative Economist enthusiastic of exploring casual problems with scientific rigors; Data Scientist supporting a data-driven decision making system in business and research operation; R/Shiny Developer writing interactive web apps focused on data-centered business and research projects.



Contact:  henry.kye@dantevision.com (business)  henrykye301@gmail.com (personal)

title: Henry Kye, PhD
text:
Professional Experience
Founder & CEO  DanteVision, South Korea | Jan 2024 – Present
Head, Digital Product & Digital Product Manager  Trial Informatics, South Korea | Oct. 2022 – Dec. 2023
Junior Data Scientist  Datacrunch Global, South Korea | May 2022 – Sept. 2022
Postdoctoral Researcher in Finance  Aalto University, Finland | Sept. 2021 – May 2022

title: Henry Kye, PhD
text:
Education
PhD in Economics | Rutgers University, New Brunswick, NJ | Sept. 2015 – Oct. 2021
MA in Economics | Soongsil University, Seoul, South Korea | Mar. 2013 – Aug. 2015
BA in Economics | Soongsil University, Seoul, South Korea | Mar. 2007 – Feb. 2013
